chapters.summary: This is misogyny. This is patriarchy. Women have been told not to come to these temples. It's not a discrimination this is a rule book to follow on Jaipur. It holds a Guinness book of world record for largest religious gathering of women.
chapters.headline: Tantric temples in India have strict rules regarding menstruation
